questions.question: Which 1970s TV show featured a trio of female detectives working for a mysterious boss named Charlie?
What was the name of the fictional town in which the 1990s TV show 'Twin Peaks' was set?
What was the title of the reality TV show that premiered in 2000, featuring contestants stranded in remote locations to compete for cash and prizes?
In the 1970s, which movie introduced audiences to the summer blockbuster phenomenon?
Which 1980s TV show featured a car that could talk and had artificial intelligence?
What 1990s movie coined the phrase, 'Life is like a box of chocolates'?
Who played the role of Rachel Green on the hit 1990s TV show 'Friends'?
Which 2000s movie featured a young wizard attending a school of witchcraft and wizardry?
questions.correctAnswer: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
incorrectAnswers: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
